about.title: About Us

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To provide exceptional travel experiences that inspire and connect people with the world's most beautiful destinations.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the leading travel platform that makes extraordinary adventures accessible to everyone.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We strive for excellence in every aspect of our service.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: We are committed to sustainable tourism practices.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We continuously innovate to enhance the travel experience.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.description: We conduct our business with honesty and transparency.

customerFocus.title: Customer Focus
customerFocus.description: We put our customers at the heart of everything we do.

authentic.title: Authentic
authentic.description: We are committed to providing the most authentic travel experiences.

sustainable.title: Sustainable
sustainable.description: We are committed to sustainable tourism practices.

satisfaction.title: Satisfaction
satisfaction.description: Customer satisfaction is our top priority.

team.title: Our Team
team.subtitle: Meet the passionate individuals behind our success
team.description: Our diverse team of travel experts and professionals is dedicated to creating unforgettable experiences for our customers.

bio.sarah: Sarah is the founder and visionary leader of TravelVista.
bio.david: David oversees operations and ensures every tour runs smoothly.
bio.maria: Maria is a travel consultant with years of international experience.
bio.james: James leads marketing and brand development for TravelVista.

history.title: Our History
history.description: Founded in 2024, we have grown from a small local tour operator to a global travel platform, serving thousands of happy travelers worldwide.

achievements.title: Our Achievements
achievements.description: We are proud of our accomplishments and continue to strive for excellence in the travel industry.

partners.title: Our Partners
partners.description: We work with trusted partners worldwide to provide the best travel experiences.

cta.title: Join Our Journey
cta.description: Be part of our growing community of travelers

about.storyText: TravelVista was founded to bring authentic and memorable travel experiences to everyone.
about.missionText: To provide exceptional travel experiences that inspire and connect people with the world's most beautiful destinations.
about.visionText: To be the leading travel platform that makes extraordinary adventures accessible to everyone.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you
contact.description: Have questions or need assistance? Our team is here to help.

form.title: Send us a message
form.name: Your Name
form.subject: Subject
form.error: Error sending message. Please try again.
form.privacy: By submitting this form, you agree to our privacy policy.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How do I book a tour?
faq.a1: You can book a tour directly on our website or contact us via email/phone.
faq.a2: You can cancel your tour according to our refund policy. Please contact us for more details.
faq.a3: We provide 24/7 customer support via hotline and email.
faq.a4: We accept bank transfer, credit cards, and popular e-wallets.

emergency.title: Emergency Contact
emergency.description: For urgent assistance during your trip

contact.name: Your Name
contact.subject: Subject
contact.timeZoneNote: Office hours are in Vietnam time zone (GMT+7)

search.placeholder: Where do you want to go?

chatbot.title: Travel Assistant Bot
chatbot.welcome: Hello! How can I assist you today?

response.beaches: Some famous beautiful beaches: Nha Trang, Phu Quoc, Da Nang, Vung Tau... Would you like to know more about a specific beach?
response.booking: You can book a tour directly on our website or contact us for assistance.
response.cancellation: Cancellation policy: you can cancel before the departure date and get a refund according to our policy. Please contact us for details.
response.discounts: We regularly have promotions and discounts for groups and loyal customers.
response.bestTime: The best time to travel depends on the destination. Which place would you like to ask about?
response.default: Sorry, I didn't understand. You can ask about tours, destinations, offers, or any travel-related questions.
